answers.answer: If you're over due, high blood pressure, preeclampsia, other health complications, baby too big, or labor starts and stalls.Though if you can, try not to get induced because pitocin does work! But it ***** and makes contractions way more painful ): but it works. Brought me from 6cm to holding my baby in an hour

question: What are some reasons they induce labor?
title: induction
